Building.Attributes: Built on a brick road, with an arch, two arched windows, a square window, English words engraved on windows and doors, puppy-shaped decoration on the roof

Arched Windows.Locations: On the left and right sides of the arch

Flower Baskets.Locations: On both sides of the arched windows

Lights.Locations: On each side of the arch

Green Plants.Locations: Planted on both sides of the building

Stone Pillar.Attributes: Stone pillar with a sculpture of a puppy
Stone Pillar.Locations: On the right side in front of the building
